AboutMe.ShortDescription: With five years of experience in eCommerce, I have developed a deep understanding of digital processes and user-centric solutions. My passion for technology and innovation has driven me to further qualify as a frontend developer. My goal is to create intuitive and high-performance digital products that inspire both businesses and users alike.

MainInfo.Headline: PROJECTS
MainInfo.Description: Here you will find some of my recent projects, showcasing my skills in frontend development. My work revolves around creating interactive, responsive, and user-friendly web applications that provide seamless digital experiences.

Join.Title: Join
Join.Description: A task manager inspired by the Kanban system. Users can create tasks, move them via drag & drop, assign contacts, and categorize them.
Join.ImplementationDetails: This was a team project with four members. I was responsible for designing and implementing the registration and login logic, as well as developing the drag & drop functionality for the board, including its UI. Additionally, I styled and coded the task detail view.
